member.summary: Finds time series within a repository.
member.param: The to find time series in. This value will be set during model binding based on the "repository" parameter in the path.

The parameters to filter the returned results. This value will be set during model binding based on the following query parameters:
Parameter Description
name Allows finding time series with a specific only. Use * as a wild card character.
description Allows finding time series with a specific only. Use * as a wild card character.
functionType Allows finding time series with a only.
cyclic Allows finding only cyclic/non-cyclic time series.
unit Allows finding time series with a specific unit only.
formula Allows finding time series with a specific formula only.
timeZone Allows finding time series with a specific time zone only.
startOfTime Allows finding time series with a specific start of time only.
Properties to order by.
Used to specify a range of results that should be returned instead of the entire result.
A to cancel the operation. This will usually be set to .
member.returns: A stream of result items - one for each found time series. If an error occurred while loading time series from the , the last item will include defaults as to what happened.
